name: Pilgrim (itch) (CHEN JINKUN)
description:
Pilgrim is a mobieus-style independent game demo, depicting a wasteland world that collapsed after highly technological advancement. Players need to act as a mechanical monk and travel through the ruins to make pilgrimages to their gods.

This demo is my graduation project, create with UE4 by myself.

Highly recommended for playing with controller, while using the keyboard, the interaction key is E.
